entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, Harry, is mentioned as having a heart rate return to normal and being woken up by his friends. He is also described as wearing glasses and having a bedside table.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby, the house-elf, is mentioned as being next to Harry's bed and looking worried. He has a Christmas bauble tied to his tea cozy.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is woken up by Harry's yell and decides to open presents with the others.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is another friend of Harry's who is woken up by Harry's yell and spots the pile of presents at the foot of his bed.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is a friend of Harry's who is woken up by Harry's yell and decides to open presents with the others.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a friend of Harry's who is woken up by Harry's yell and decides to open presents with the others.

relationships.description: Harry interacts with Dobby, who is standing next to his bed and looking worried. Harry tells Dobby not to bend over him like that in the future.
Harry wakes up Ron, who is one of his friends and decides to open presents with the others.
Harry wakes up Seamus, who is another friend and spots the pile of presents at the foot of his bed.
Harry wakes up Dean, who is a friend and decides to open presents with the others.
Harry wakes up Neville, who is a friend and decides to open presents with the others.
